title: Enhanced User Authentication System
iWant: to securely authenticate with multi-factor verification and session management
soThat: I can protect my personal data and maintain secure access to premium features

acceptanceTests.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
acceptanceTests.description: Given a user completes initial login, when they are prompted for MFA, then they can authenticate via SMS, email, or authenticator app within 60 seconds

acceptanceTests.title: Session Security
acceptanceTests.description: Given a user is authenticated, when they remain inactive for 30 minutes, then their session expires and requires re-authentication

acceptanceTests.title: Account Lockout Protection
acceptanceTests.description: Given a user fails login 3 times, when they attempt again, then their account is temporarily locked for 10 minutes with email notification

acceptanceTests.title: Password Strength Validation
acceptanceTests.description: Given a user creates a password, when it's validated, then it must contain 12+ characters with uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters

acceptanceTests.title: Secure Password Recovery
acceptanceTests.description: Given a user requests password reset, when they click the email link, then they can set a new password within 15 minutes using a cryptographically secure token
